text: As rumors swirl that Beyonce and Jay Z might be headed for splitsville, a new report reveals that Blue Ivy Carter would be at the center of their divorce — and which one of them wants full custody, no questions asked. Beyonce, 34, is not going down without a fight in her alleged divorce from Jay Z, 45. As the shocking claims about their split get worse and worse, Blue Ivy, 3, seems to be their next battle royale. Will their little girl become the center of a tug of war event? To hear more about Beyonce and Jay Z, head over to iTunes and download the latest HollywoodLife podcast for free! Even though everyone at HollywoodLife. com is in a Jayonce prayer circle hoping that InTouchWeekly ‘ s Sept. 21
